entry.title: Julien added 'A Line to Kill'
entry.content: 📚 “A Line to Kill” by Anthony Horowitz ⭐️ Rated: 3/5 📝 "A Line to Kill is more interesting for its meta-story, the writer and his fictional detective, than for the murder itself. The mystery does keep you hooked, and the final twist is satisfying, but it’s…" 🏷️ #AnthonyHorowitz
